input.sentences: everyone grabs a sign and begin to march in protest .
these guys are very enthusiastic about the protest . they even bring a drum .
these kids are too young to know what 's going on . their parents make them wear signs to support their cause .
a man from the protest is able to get on local television . he gives a rousing speech in order to convince others to support his cause .
these people gather around a big sign that reads `` immigrant rights are human rights . '' they are tired of not having rights and they are letting everyone know they are fed up .
